English: Collect Twinke Stone by hunting Aibatt.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Twinke Stone dengan berburu Aibatt.

English: Deliver it to Magician Instructor Lopaze.
Indonesian: Kirimkan ke Magician Instructor Lopaze.

English: Deliver it to Acrobat Instructor Tailer.
Indonesian: Kirimkan ke Acrobat Instructor Tailer.

English: Get rid of Ren from Iblis Temple located southern part of Saint Morning.
Indonesian: Singkirkan Ren dari Iblis Temple yang terletak di bagian selatan Saint Morning.

English: Get rid of Sisif and find Soulstone of Hero.
Indonesian: Singkirkan Sisif dan temukan Soulstone of Hero.

English: Get rid of Venel Guardian and find Venel Heart.
Indonesian: Singkirkan Venel Guardian dan temukan Venel Heart.

English: Get rid of Rubo and find Letter of Hynan.
Indonesian: Singkirkan Rubo dan temukan Letter of Hynan.

English: Get rid of Prankster and find History Book of Heroes.
Indonesian: Singkirkan Prankster dan temukan History Book of Heroes.

English: Deliver Earring of Heren to Ata.
Indonesian: Kirimkan Earring of Heren ke Ata.

English: Get rid of Shacalpion and find Tear of Darkness.
Indonesian: Singkirkan Shacalpion dan temukan Tear of Darkness.

English: Get rid of Kidler and find Clue of Golden Helmet.
Indonesian: Singkirkan Kidler dan temukan Clue of Golden Helmet.

English: Meet Kurumin.
Indonesian: Bertemu Kurumin.

English: Defeat the wheelem and get the soul stone.
Indonesian: Kalahkan wheelem dan dapatkan batu jiwa.

English: Defeat the hoaren and get the Hall Document.
Indonesian: Kalahkan hoaren dan dapatkan Hall Document.

English: Defeat the steam walker and get the poster of skill(Master)
Indonesian: Kalahkan steam walker dan dapatkan poster of skill(Master)

English: Meet Segho and give him the Hall Document.
Indonesian: Temui Segho dan berikan dia Hall Document.

English: Defeat the Ren and get the Seal of Aenn.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Ren dan dapatkan Seal of Aenn.

English: Meet Tesar and give him the Seal of Aenn.
Indonesian: Temui Tesar dan berikan dia Seal of Aenn.

English: Defeat the hunter X and get the Teardrop of Aenn.
Indonesian: Kalahkan hunter X dan dapatkan Teardrop of Aenn.

English: Defeat the kinsay and get the Magic Underwear of Power.
Indonesian: Kalahkan kinsay dan dapatkan Magic Underwear of Power.

English: Meet Rufan, the boss of the blue flag and give him the Magic Underwear of Power.
Indonesian: Temui Rufan, bos bendera biru dan berikan Magic Underwear of Power.

English: Meet Parinee, the manage of the Saint City station and give her the Feather of Magic Power.
Indonesian: Temui Parinee, pengelola stasiun Saint City dan berikan Feather of Magic Power.

English: Bring it to the mayor of Darkon.
Indonesian: Bawa ke walikota Darkon.

English: Defeat Organiger.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Organiger.

English: Defeat Gangard.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Gangard.

English: Defeat Hardeser.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Hardeser.

English: Defeat the group of Mia and get the Mia Report.
Indonesian: Kalahkan kelompok Mia dan dapatkan Mia Report.

English: Meet the mayor of the Saint City.
Indonesian: Bertemu walikota Saint City.

English: Defeat the leader of the red bang Theives.
Indonesian: Kalahkan pemimpin red bang Theives.

English: Defeat the red bang Theives and get the symbol of the theives.
Indonesian: Kalahkan red bang Theives dan dapatkan simbol theives.

English: Kill Lord Bang and obtain necklace.
Indonesian: Bunuh Lord Bang dan dapatkan kalung.

English: Hand it to Strange Collector
Indonesian: Serahkan ke Strange Collector

English: Look for an egg after killing Red Mantis C
Indonesian: Cari telur setelah membunuh Red Mantis C

English: Bring it to Dr. Estern
Indonesian: Bawa ke Dr. Estern

English: Bring it to Dr. Estly
Indonesian: Bawa ke Dr. Estly

English: Please give it to Mayor in Darkon
Indonesian: Tolong berikan ke walikota Darkon

English: Bring it to Chairman of History Society Gothante.
Indonesian: Bawa ke Chairman of History Society Gothante.

English: Bring it to Manager of Ancient Document Rovanett
Indonesian: Bawa ke Manager of Ancient Document Rovanett

English: Bring it to Great Magician Laola
Indonesian: Bawa ke Great Magician Laola

English: Bring it to Historian Martinyc
Indonesian: Bawa ke Historian Martinyc

English: Bring it to Mercenary Instructor Hyuit
Indonesian: Bawa ke Mercenary Instructor Hyuit

English: Kill Small Mushpang
Indonesian: Bunuh Small Mushpang

English: Bring it to Assist Instructor Kidmen
Indonesian: Bawa ke Assist Instructor Kidmen

English: Bring it to Hachal in Flarine
Indonesian: Bawa ke Hachal in Flarine

English: Bring it to Hachal in Darkon
Indonesian: Bawa ke Hachal di Darkon

English: Receive mail from Rankashu who is standing in front of Dekane Mine
Indonesian: Terima mail dari Rankashu yang berdiri di depan Dekane Mine

English: Drian exists in the first room
Indonesian: Drian ada di ruangan pertama

English: Kill keakoon in the third room and obtain key.
Indonesian: Bunuh keakoon di ruangan ketiga dan dapatkan kunci.

English: Move to the third room and check a cell where Nevil is locked.
Indonesian: Pindah ke ruangan ketiga dan periksa sel tempat Nevil terkunci.

English: Kill Elite Keakoon Guard Leaders in the third room.
Indonesian: Bunuh Elite Keakoon Guard Leaders di ruangan ketiga.

English: Talk with Nevin in prison
Indonesian: Berbicara dengan  Nevin di penjara

English: Break Roach egg in fifth room and obtain 15 Pink Roach Fluids
Indonesian: Pecahkan telur Roach di ruangan kelima dan dapatkan 15 Pink Roach Fluids

English: Break Roach egg in fourth room and obtain 15 Blue Roach Fluids
Indonesian: Pecahkan telur Roach di ruangan keempat dan dapatkan 15 Blue Roach Fluids

English: Break Roach egg in fifth room and obtain 1 Pink Roach Queen Fluid
Indonesian: Break Roach egg in fifth room and obtain 1 Pink Roach Queen Fluid

English: Break Roach egg in fourth room and obtain 1 Blue Roach Queen Fluid
Indonesian: Break Roach egg in fourth room and obtain 1 Blue Roach Queen Fluid

English: Obtain 30 Cillins nearby
Indonesian: Dapatkan 30 Cillins disekitar

English: Meet Kazen
Indonesian: Bertemu Kazen

English: Move to where Kazen is and kill Green Trillipy. Then obtain 30 Ribenuums
Indonesian: Pindah ke tempat Kazen berada dan bunuh Green Trillipy. Kemudian dapatkan 30 Ribenuum

English: You can find Nein in Dead Waldernis of Darkon 3 and do 'Finding Tridum'. Then collect 10 Ribenuums
Indonesian: Kamu dapat menemukan Nein di Dead Waldernis of Darkon 3 dan melakukan 'Finding Tridum'. Kemudian kumpulkan 10 Ribenuum

English: Speak with Cell in Darkon 1 and do 'Trace of ID card'. After getting a key, you can obtain 20 Tridum.
Indonesian: Bicara dengan Cell di Darkon 1 dan lakukan 'Trace of ID card'. Setelah mendapatkan kunci, kamu bisa mendapatkan 20 Tridum.

English: Bring Ribenuum to Nein
Indonesian: Bawa Ribenuum ke Nein

English: You can see Mutant Fefern and Mutant Nyangnyang Queen nearby.
Indonesian: Kamu dapat melihat Mutant Fefern dan Mutant Nyangnyang Queen di dekatnya.

English: Kill Vice Veduque living in the last room of Mars dungeon.
Indonesian: Bunuh Vice Veduque tinggal di ruangan terakhir penjara bawah tanah Mars.

English: It exists in Iblis and revelation can be found in the last room on left.
Indonesian: Itu ada di Iblis dan wahyu dapat ditemukan di ruangan terakhir di sebelah kiri.

English: Kill 8 Iblis Crashers in the Iblis Temple.
Indonesian: Bunuh 8 Iblis Crashers di Iblis Temple.

English: Kill an Iblis Guardian in the Iblis Temple.
Indonesian: Bunuh Iblis Crashers di Iblis Temple.

English: Obtain the Pattern by Killing an Iblis Guardian.
Indonesian: Dapatkan Pattern setelah membunuh Iblis Guardian.

English: Please purchase a Long Sword from [Shield] Luda.
Indonesian: Silakan beli long sword dari [Shield] Luda.

English: After speaking with Drian, obtain a pouch.
Indonesian: Setelah berbicara dengan Drian, dapatkan kantong.

English: A group of Organigor exists nearby.
Indonesian: Sekelompok Organigor ada di dekatnya.

English: A group of Gangard exists nearby.
Indonesian: Sekelompok Gangard ada di dekatnya.

English: A group of Hadeseor exists nearby.
Indonesian: Sekelompok Hadeseor ada di dekatnya.

English: Radion gave you this Fragment of Memories.
Indonesian: Radion memberimu Fragment of Memories ini.

English: Reodos gave you this Elemental Hero's Pendant.
Indonesian: Reodos memberimu Elemental Hero's Pendant ini.

English: Zoro gave you this letter.
Indonesian: Zoro memberimu surat ini.

English: Bring this Letter to Zoro.
Indonesian: Bawa Letter ini ke Zoro.

English: You got this Promise Ring from the Garbagespiders.
Indonesian: Kamu mendapatkan Promise Ring ini dari Garbagespiders.

English: Bring this Letter to Dior.
Indonesian: Bawa Letter ini ke Dior.

English: Bring this Hero's Pendant to Reonan.
Indonesian: Bawa Hero's Pendant ini ke Reonan.

English: You got this Hero's Pendant from the Bearnerkys.
Indonesian: Kamu mendapatkan Hero's Pendant ini dari Bearnerkys.

English: Bring this Agony Ore to Ainher.
Indonesian: Bawa Agony Ore ini ke Ainher.

English: Symbols of Shade drop from Violet masquerpets with a level close to yours.
Indonesian: Symbols of Shade jatuh dari Violet masquerpets dengan level yang mendekati level Anda.

English: Collect Erons from Erons Catchers.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Erons dari Erons Catchers.

English: Collect Krasec from Krasec Catchers.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Krasec dari Krasec Catchers.

English: Collect Mineral from Mineral Catchers.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Mineral dari Mineral Catchers.

English: Collect Guru from Guru Catchers.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Guru dari Guru Catchers.

English: Give the Smelted Steels to Chenbing.
Indonesian: Berikan Smelted Steels ke Chenbing.

English: Give the Metallurgical Bull Ring to Colack.
Indonesian: Berikan Metallurgical Bull Ring ke Colack.

English: Give the Supercharged Lightning Rod to Gothante.
Indonesian: Berikan Supercharged Lightning Rod ke Gothante.

English: Collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from final dungeon bosses.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ dari boss-boss final dungeon.

English: Give the Elixir of Cleansing to Hael.
Indonesian: Berikan Elixir of Cleansing untuk Hael.

English: Collect Ultima from giants and treasure chests.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Ultima dari raksasa dan peti harta karun.

English: Kill %s Prismatic Cobras and Water Totem Pole
Indonesian: Bunuh %s Prismatic Cobras dan Water Totem Pole

English: Kill %s Twinstrike Cobras and Wind Totem Pole
Indonesian: Bunuh %s Twinstrike Cobras dan Wind Totem Pole

English: Kill %s Tanuki Enforcers and Earth Totem Pole
Indonesian: Bunuh %s Tanuki Enforcers dan Earth Totem Pole

English: Kill %s Wildwood Stalkers and Fire Totem Pole
Indonesian: Bunuh %s Wildwood Stalkers dan Fire Totem Pole

English: Kill Kriton, the Shade's right hand living deep inside Herneos.
Indonesian: Kill Kriton, the Shade's right hand living deep inside Herneos.

English: Kill 150 Dreadfins in the Herneos Dungeon.
Indonesian: Kill 150 Dreadfins in the Herneos Dungeon.

English: Kill 150 Dreadscales in the Herneos Dungeon.
Indonesian: Kill 150 Dreadscales in the Herneos Dungeon.

English: Kill 150 Luminfins in the Herneos Dungeon.
Indonesian: Kill 150 Luminfins in the Herneos Dungeon.

English: Obtained by talking to Dr. Estly.
Indonesian: Obtained by talking to Dr. Estly.

English: Obtained by killing Dreadfins in the Herneos Dungeon.
Indonesian: Obtained by killing Dreadfins in the Herneos Dungeon.

English: Obtained by killing Dreadscales in the Herneos Dungeon.
Indonesian: Obtained by killing Dreadscales in the Herneos Dungeon.

English: Obtained by killing Luminfins in the Herneos Dungeon.
Indonesian: Obtained by killing Luminfins in the Herneos Dungeon.

Indonesian: Kill [Depths Guardian] Bunyip, the Shade's General living deep inside Herneos.

English: Kill [Depths Queen] Nereid, the Shade's General living deep inside Herneos.
Indonesian: Kill [Depths Queen] Nereid, the Shade's General living deep inside Herneos.

English: The lost treasure of Herneos should be easy to find inside Herneos.
Indonesian: The lost treasure of Herneos should be easy to find inside Herneos.

English: You should be able to find one by exploring the Herneos dungeon.
Indonesian: You should be able to find one by exploring the Herneos dungeon.

English: Bring it to Gergantes.
Indonesian: Bring it to Gergantes.

English: Kill %s more [Twisted Soul] Orcus to spawn an hidden chest
Indonesian: Kill %s more [Twisted Soul] Orcus to spawn an hidden chest

Indonesian: Kill %s more [Tormented Soul] Nergal to spawn the Mysterious Adventurer

Indonesian: Kill %s more [Demonic Soul] Hel to spawn an hidden chests

Indonesian: Kill %s more [Perverted Soul] Morrigan to spawn the Mysterious Adventurer

Indonesian: Kill %s more [Anguished Soul] Mara to spawn an hidden chest

Indonesian: Kill %s more [Violent Soul] Ghed to spawn an hidden chest

Indonesian: Defeat %s Dungeon Final Boss
